titles.title: Honoring the 250th anniversary of the founding of Rutgers, the State University of New Jersey.
Honoring the 250th anniversary of the founding of Rutgers, the State University of New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Honors Rutgers, the State University of New Jersey, as it celebrates 250 years of rich history as a colonial college, a land-grant institution, and a great state university that has been a source of pride for New Jersey and the people of the United States.
